sources.title: The Lucky Texan
sources.description: Jerry Mason (Wayne), a young Texan, and Jake Benson (Hayes), an old rancher, become partners and strike it rich with a gold mine. They then find their lives complicated by bad guys and a woman.

sources.title: The Lucky Texan (1934), with John Wayne
sources.channelName: Public Domain Movies - Classic Old Movies

This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

sources.title: The Lucky Texan (1934) Strike It Rich - Or die trying! John Wayne Western film
sources.description:
Jerry Mason (John Wayne), fresh out of college back East, heads home to Texas to join a blacksmith business with family friend Jake (George Hayes). But when they discover a gold nugget in a horseshoe, they're led down a dangerous path, as crooks Joe Cole (Yakima Canutt) and Harris (Lloyd Whitlock) scheme to take the rock from the unsuspecting Jerry and Jake. This ultimately gets Jake shot and wounded, lands Jerry in jail unjustly and leaves the pair plotting to get revenge on the criminals.

Alternative title: Gold Strike River (1934)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/AbXcCF5FCr4


Director & Writer: Robert N. Bradbury
Stars: John Wayne, Barbara Sheldon, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Lloyd Whitlock 
Genres: Action, Adventure, Romance, Western
Release date: January 22, 1934 (USA)
Filming location: Lone Pine, California


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: When miners Mason and Benson turn in their gold at the assay office, the assay officials trail Benson back to the mine and shoot him. Mason is then arrested for the murder. But the supposedly dead Benson survived and now plans a surprise for the culprits at Mason's trial.
metadata.Actors: John Wayne, Barbara Sheldon, George 'Gabby' Hayes
